luhnMod10

public static boolean luhnMod10(java.lang.String number)
Luhn Algorithm implementation.

Luhn Algorithm is used as a simple checksum for a variety of identification numbers like credit card numbers, IMEI numbers, SSN etc. Luhn validation

Parameters:
number - to validate using luhn algorithm
Returns:
true if the checksum passes (ie) Result%10 ==0 ||Result%5==0.

CRC32

public static int CRC32(byte[] data,
                        int offset,
                        int count)
Calculates the CRC32 value. This function doesn't use a table for reasons of memory saving.

Parameters:
data - the byte array
offset - the offset of the start of the data in the array
count - the count of bytes
Returns:
the CRC32 value
